class_notes: Synchronous class attendance required , Technology required: webcam and microphone ,There will be an additional asynchronous component to this class.
course_description: A survey of ancient Rome, from its origins in legend and myth to late antiquity, as seen through its principal literary texts in their historical and cultural context.
sections: Class Nbr: 4212, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 8-9:15a, Instructor: L. Hagemann, Status: Open
